items.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro OG
items.info: The iconic Air Jordan 1 in its original 'Chicago' colorway, featuring a high-top design and premium leather construction.

items.name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2
items.info: The Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2, known for its sleek and futuristic design, featuring a knit upper and Boost cushioning.

items.name: Nike Air Max 97 OG
items.info: The Air Max 97 OG, a retro running sneaker with reflective silver and red accents, known for its sleek design and visible Air cushioning.

items.name: Puma Clyde Court
items.info: The Puma Clyde Court, a modern basketball sneaker with performance features and a stylish design, featuring a knit upper and responsive cushioning.

items.name: New Balance 990v5
items.info: The New Balance 990v5, known for its classic American style, premium suede/mesh upper, and cushioned midsole, perfect for casual wear or running.

items.name: Nike Air Max 270 React
items.info: The Nike Air Max 270 React combines the iconic Air Max cushioning with modern React foam for ultimate comfort and style.

items.name: Adidas Ultra Boost 22
items.info: The Adidas Ultra Boost 22 delivers next-level comfort with its full-length Boost midsole, engineered mesh upper, and responsive cushioning.

items.name: Nike Air VaporMax Plus
items.info: The Nike Air VaporMax Plus features futuristic design lines and a unique Air cushioning system for exceptional comfort.

items.name: Under Armour Curry One
items.info: The Under Armour Curry One basketball sneaker is built for performance, featuring a lightweight design and responsive cushioning for quick movements.

items.name: Fendi Logo Slides
items.info: Fendi logo slides with a bold design, perfect for casual wear during the summer. Featuring a comfortable, slip-on style with logo branding.

items.name: Gucci GG Supreme Belt Bag
items.info: Gucci GG Supreme Belt Bag crafted from the iconic GG canvas, featuring a zip closure and adjustable strap. A stylish accessory for any outfit.

items.name: Ray-Ban Wayfarer Sunglasses
items.info: Ray-Ban Wayfarer sunglasses, a timeless accessory for any season, featuring durable plastic frames and high-quality lenses.

items.name: Vans Old Skool Classic
items.info: Vans Old Skool Classic, with its iconic side stripe and durable canvas construction, perfect for skateboarding and casual wear.

items.name: Reebok Classic Leather
items.info: The Reebok Classic Leather sneaker combines comfort and style with a leather upper and EVA midsole, offering a clean, retro design.

items.name: Nike Zoom Freak 1
items.info: The Nike Zoom Freak 1, designed for Giannis Antetokounmpo, featuring responsive Zoom Air cushioning and a lightweight mesh upper.

items.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
items.info: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star, an all-time classic, featuring a canvas upper, rubber sole, and a timeless silhouette.

items.name: Balenciaga Triple S
items.info: The Balenciaga Triple S is a luxury sneaker with a chunky silhouette and multi-layered sole, blending high-fashion with streetwear.

items.name: Nike Air Force 1
items.info: The Nike Air Force 1 is a versatile classic sneaker, known for its clean white leather upper and cushioned sole for all-day comfort.

items.name: Nike Kids Revolution 5
items.info: The Nike Kids Revolution 5 offers lightweight cushioning and durable support for growing feet, perfect for active children.

items.name: Adidas Kids Superstar
items.info: The iconic Adidas Superstar in kids' size, featuring the famous shell toe and comfortable fit for everyday wear.

items.name: Puma Kids Smash v2
items.info: The Puma Kids Smash v2 offers a classic tennis-inspired design with a comfortable fit and durable construction for active kids.

items.name: New Balance Kids 574 Core
items.info: The New Balance Kids 574 Core provides excellent support and comfort with a classic retro design for everyday wear.

items.name: Vans Kids Old Skool
items.info: The Vans Kids Old Skool features the iconic side stripe and durable canvas construction, perfect for kids who want a classic skate look.
